workshoptitle: Get started with Oracle Database@Azure Databases Monitoring and Management

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisite lab to check the Oracle Database@Azure subscription in Microsoft Azure Portal and log in to Oracle Cloud Console

tutorials.description: Exploring Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Database Management Diagnostic & Management
